resources.string:
All donations go to maintain the Amitabha Stupa in Sedona Arizona so that it and it's 13 surrounding acres remain freely open to the public as a place of pilgrimage. 

 What is a stupa? Imagine a place where you can go to pray that magnifies that prayer a hundred fold. A place where a living presence of compassion and enlightened mind exists with the sole purpose of being a beacon that radiates blessings to all who come within 100 miles of its location. That's exactly what a stupa is. When you come to a stupa to make prayers with the pure intention of bringing benefit to others, it can change your life, your heart, your mind profoundly. 

 What is a mantra? In short, a prayer to purify the mind from any suffering or obscuration. 

Please pass this along to all who would benefit.

Welcome to Walking Buddha. 

Please sign in so that we can share your prayers with the 
world. 

   ~The Walking Buddha Team

Peace does not come through prayer, we human beings 
must create peace. 

  ~ The Dalai Lama

The Future Depends On The Present 

        ~H.H. Dalai Lama. 
 
 We offer this app to you with the hope 
 that suffering will be alleviated in all 
 forms throughout the world starting 
 today and until it ends.
 
       ~The Walking Buddha Team
